rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现大脑的“蓝斑”是睡眠周期的关键参与者洛桑大学的研究人员发现了大脑“蓝斑”在睡眠及其干扰中的新作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Research-identizes-the-brains-locus-coeruleus-as-key-player-in-sleep-cycles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Research-identizes-the-brains-locus-coeruleus-as-key-player-in-sleep-cycles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75b5fc25-e2b3-4954-96c2-d7816c27b9d2 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:57:07 -0500 Research identifies the brain's 'locus coeruleus' as key player in sleep cycles
研究人员开发出有效地将治疗药物输送到大脑的新方法西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员开发了一种创新方法——在小鼠模型和分离的人脑组织中得到证实——安全有效地将治疗药物输送到大脑中，为治疗各种神经和精神疾病提供了新的可能性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-efficiently-deliver-therapeutics-into-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-efficiently-deliver-therapeutics-into-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be7ab864-4b45-43da-b8ce-b65592254c6d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:49:03 -0500 Researchers develop new approach to effectively deliver therapeutics into the brain
研究指出了抑制黑色素瘤过度进展的策略杜克癌症研究所的研究人员发现了潜在的生物标志物，可以预测检查点抑制剂药物产生适得其反的可能性，从而推动黑色素瘤细胞的过度进展，而不是释放免疫系统来对抗它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-points-to-a-strategy-for-inhibiting-hyper-progression-of-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-points-to-a-strategy-for-inhibiting-hyper-progression-of-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7dd2559-798e-45fa-8a76-79697e44f64e Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:43:51 -0500 Study points to a strategy for inhibiting hyper-progression of melanoma
研究揭示吸烟和电子烟对血管功能的严重影响研究人员发现，即使不含尼古丁，吸烟和电子烟也会对血管功能产生急性影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-reveals-acute-impact-of-smoking-and-vaping-on-angio-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-reveals-acute-impact-of-smoking-and-vaping-on-angio-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cc0ffd9-cfe5-43a6-ac40-e8949b29b558 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:33:48 -0500 Study reveals acute impact of smoking and vaping on vascular function
aCA 注册期间反欺诈工作经受现实考验联邦监管机构表示，近几周来，由于与消费者投诉相关的案件数量减少了近三分之一，未经授权改变平价医疗法案计划的情况似乎有所减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Anti-fraud-efforts-meet-real-world-test-during-aCA-enrollment-period.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Anti-fraud-efforts-meet-real-world-test-during-aCA-enrollment-period.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7e17af3-a748-4a2c-b978-ba0abd29c7e8 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:30:51 -0500 Anti-fraud efforts meet real-world test during aCA enrollment period
公共交通上的敌对互动损害了黑人的福祉公共汽车和火车上的黑人 -；无论是作为乘客还是过境工人——；基奥全球事务学院社会学家的一项新研究表明，他们面临着威胁他们安全感和幸福感的敌对遭遇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Hostile-interactions-on-public-transit-harm-Black-mens-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Hostile-interactions-on-public-transit-harm-Black-mens-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ff5dea2-f1eb-4fc7-bbbe-578375a8db93 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:29:39 -0500 Hostile interactions on public transit harm Black men's well-being
研究发现骨密度下降与左旋甲状腺素有关根据下周在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 年会上公布的一项研究，左旋甲状腺素是美国老年人中第二常用的处方药物，可能与骨质流失有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-finds-bone-密度-loss-associate-with-levothyroxine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Study-finds-bone-密度-loss-associate-with-levothyroxine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79dd326d-7bcf-4be3-94d9-18cd9f9308a0 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:23:39 -0500 Study finds bone density loss associated with levothyroxine
开创性的方法描绘了活体大脑中的基因活动FutureNeuro、爱尔兰转化脑科学研究中心和 RCSI 医学与健康科学大学的研究人员与国际合作伙伴合作，开发了一种突破性方法来分析活人大脑中的基因活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Groundwriting-method-profiles-gene-activity-in-the-living-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Groundwriting-method-profiles-gene-activity-in-the-living-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c65ac321-6a29-454f-9c6d-4eecc9fe8f6c Mon, 25 Nov 2024 06:02:00 -0500 Groundbreaking method profiles gene activity in the living brain
检测技术在 RSNA 2024 上推出先进的 X 射线探测器产品组合全球领先的 X 射线探测器解决方案检测技术公司在 RSNA 2024 展会上推出了全面的平板 X 射线探测器产品组合，以推进医学成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Detection-Technology-launches-advanced-X-ray- detector-portfolio-at-RSNA-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Detection-Technology-launches-advanced-X-ray- detector-portfolio-at-RSNA-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f014e7f-2c94-446c-9a25-3861cac1a34b Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:05:00 -0500 Detection Technology launches advanced X-ray detector portfolio at RSNA 2024
Mursla Bio 宣布 EvoLiver 检测在肝癌检测中取得了可喜的结果Mursla Bio 是细胞外囊泡 (EV) 科学领域的领导者，其使命是通过动态活检技术的力量显着改善高危患者的癌症结果，今天宣布了其多中心临床研究 MEV01 的结果，该研究与领先的学术机构包括伦敦大学学院、伦敦帝国学院、圣玛丽亚大学医院和格拉茨医科大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bio-announces-promising-results-for-EvoLiver-test-in-liver-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Mursla-Bio-announces-promising-results-for-EvoLiver-test-in-liver-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71e93153-496c-46f9-843a-5cf355be9c13 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 00:04:00 -0500 Mursla Bio announces promising results for EvoLiver test in liver cancer detection
